org.apache.log4j.pattern

类 IntegerPatternConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.log4j.pattern.PatternConverter
      • org.apache.log4j.pattern.IntegerPatternConverter

  • public final class IntegerPatternConverter
extends PatternConverter
    Formats an integer.
    作者:
    Curt Arnold

      • format

        public void format(java.lang.Object obj,
          java.lang.StringBuffer toAppendTo)
        Formats an object into a string buffer.
        指定者:
        format 在类中 PatternConverter
        参数:
        obj - event to format, may not be null.
        toAppendTo - string buffer to which the formatted event will be appended. May not be null.
